CodeExample.Title: Get the Attendee extended resource
CodeExample.Summary: To get the Attendee extended resource, submit an `HTTP GET` request of the following REST call syntax.
CodeExample.Request: GET /<version>/myOrganization/groups/<Group.objectId>/CalendarView/<Event.Id>/Attendees HTTP/1.1 Host : graph.microsoft.com Authorization : Bearer <access_token> Accept : application/json;odata=verbose

Remarks.string: An extended resource is at an edge of the resource graph. You cannot navigate further from an extended resource.
